solution_line_template: He needs to buy enough tokens for {total_games} games because {num_friends} x {games_per_friend} = <<{num_friends}*{games_per_friend}={total_games}>>{total_games}
He needs to buy {total_tokens_needed} tokens because {tokens_per_game} x {total_games} = <<{tokens_per_game}*{total_games}={total_tokens_needed}>>{total_tokens_needed}
